title: Manage a Broken Escalator
description: An escalator suddenly stops working during a busy ingress period.

tasks.description: Receive an alert that the escalator has malfunctioned.
Dispatch a maintenance technician to investigate the escalator.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends an elevator/escalator technician to the location.

tasks.description: Dispatch staff to the top and bottom of the escalator to direct guests to the nearest stairs or elevators.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends staff to manage crowd flow around the hazard.

tasks.description: Update the venue's digital signage to indicate the escalator is out of service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent posts a notice on nearby digital signs.
